mapper.select: SELECT CR.ROOM_NAME, CR.ROOM_ID, A.CONTENTS FROM ALARM A JOIN CHAT_ROOM CR ON CR.ROOM_ID = A.ROOM_ID WHERE A.ALARM_CODE = 'A01' AND A.RECEIVER = #{nickName} AND (A.ROOM_ID, A.ALARM_ID) IN ( SELECT ROOM_ID, MAX(ALARM_ID) AS MAX_ALARM_ID FROM ALARM WHERE ALARM_CODE = 'A01' AND RECEIVER = #{nickName} GROUP BY ROOM_ID )
